alert.note: Alert for Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis (Maine) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued November 22 at 2:25AM EST until November 22 at 6:00PM EST by NWS Caribou
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 6 PM EST THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Mixed precipitation expected. Total snow accumulations between 3 and 7 inches and ice accumulations around a light glaze. * WHERE...Portions of Central Highlands, Far Northern, and North Woods Maine * WHEN...Until 6 PM EST this evening. * IMPACTS...Roads, and especially bridges and overpasses, will likely become slick and hazardous. Travel could be very difficult. The hazardous conditions could impact the Wednesday morning and evening commutes. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches.
info.instruction: A Winter Weather Advisory means that periods of snow, sleet or freezing rain will cause travel difficulties. Expect slippery roads and limited visibilities, and use caution while driving. The latest road conditions for Maine can be obtained by going to newengland511.org.

area.areaDesc: Central Piscataquis; Northern Penobscot; Northern Piscataquis; Northern Somerset; Northwest Aroostook; Southern Piscataquis
